page.title: 13RECREATION AND SPORT.
page.content: Our block is well provided for in the form of parks and recreation grounds, having a park, a country park and a number of recreation grounds. The Golf Course is in the north west of our block off Manchester Road. The club has 470 members on its books which includes 60 juniors. The land used to be owned by Lord Derby. The professional in 1920 was Harry Varden and he was the only person ever to win the British Open Championship six times. The Bowling Green is off Hollins Lane and is very popular with the locals.
